title: Potential GDP decreases under which conditions

content.question: Potential gross domestic product will decrease under which of the following conditions?

choices.label: The growth rate of the population increases more rapidly than the growth rate of gross domestic product.
Nominal gross domestic product increases more than real gross domestic product.
The natural rate of unemployment decreases.
The country’s annual depreciation is greater than its annual gross investment.
The monetary authorities adopt an easy monetary policy.

content.answer: The country’s annual depreciation is greater than its annual gross investment.
